TopicTitle: Kerbalnaut Trainer: Matterson Aerospace Ultralight Powered Glider

Articles.Content:
When a Kerbalnaut dies, it is a right proper shame. However, when a Kerbalnaut dies in a horrible painful flaming death in an incredibly fast, expensive prototype aircraft, it\'s a fiscal nightmare. 

Now introducing the Matterson Aerospace Ultralight Powered Training Glider!

Designed to give your Potential Kerbalnaut a better then 50% chance of flying again, it lands extremely easily.

Best yet, it has only one engine, so it\'s cheap to replace if your Jebadiah wannabe decides to do a triple backflip during takeoff.

runs on 100% organic crude oil.
